description: At Lee Health, your healthcare is personal. National leaders in primary care, pediatrics, orthopedics and more. Call 239-481-4111 to schedule an appointment.
cleaned_text: Health Education & Navigation Located within the Lee Health Coconut Point facility, this Healthy Life Center offers a variety of services and education to support healthy lifestyles, early detection of disease, and chronic disease management. This facility includes a teaching kitchen, multiple education spaces, holistic treatment rooms, a teaching garden, and a yoga and meditation studio. Partner with our team to navigate health services, including scheduling assistance with Lee Physician Group or an outpatient service such as rehabilitation or testing. We are proud to be a resource for all your health and wellness needs. We're only 5 miles from I-75 and Miromar Outlets. Take Exit 123 west on Corkscrew Road/CR-850. At Via Coconut Point, turn left (south) and in 2.5 miles turn right (west) into the Lee Health Coconut Point parking lot. What is Wellness? Wellness promotes change, growth, education, happiness, preventive health, and achieving lifelong goals. Lee Health sees the benefits in promoting wellness in our flourishing, vital Southwest Florida community. As we strive to be national leaders of health and healing, we're committed to helping you stay active, energized, and engaged every day. Here are some of the fun things you can find at the Healthy Life Center at Coconut Point: Classes and Workshops [Cooking demonstrations](https://www.leehealth.org/health-and-wellness/teaching-kitchens) - Nutrition and wellness courses - Integrative medicine seminars - Lifestyle classes - Disease management education and prevention classes - Children's programs Holistic Services [Acupuncture](https://www.leehealth.org/our-services/alternative-medicine/acupuncture) - Massage - Yoga - Meditation Health Screenings - Blood pressure - Memory - Balance - Vision - Hearing - Skin Cancer Social Meet-ups - Walking club - Support groups - Book club - Holiday events Parking is easy at Lee Health Coconut Point. Patients and visitors can park for free right outside the front entrance and across our campus. Monday - Friday: 8 a.m.- 5 p.m. Saturday - Sunday: Closed
